CaChannel_Yamada98 Class Reference

#include <specific_ion_channels.h>

Inheritance diagram for CaChannel_Yamada98:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Ca concentration dependent ion channel.

From: Yamada, Koch and Adams: Multiple Channels and Calcium Dynamics, Editors: Koch, Segev, MIT Press 1998) Ca mechanism is included in the channel class not the neuron class.

Public Attributes

  • float u
    Constant step increase in the calcium concentration [Ca] for each spike; [units=Mol; range=(0,1); readwrite;].
  • float Ts
    Time constant for the deactivation of the calcium concentration [Ca]; [units=Sec; range=(0,1e15); readwrite;].
  • double Ca
    Interior calcium concentration [Ca]; [units=Mol; range=(0,1); readwrite;].

Protected Attributes

  • float C1
    Constant for the exponential Euler integration step;.
